      • loadRooms

        protected void loadRooms()

      • alterUsersMap

        protected void alterUsersMap(java.lang.String room,
                             java.lang.String nick,
                             common.RoomPacket.Join flag)
        Is responsible for adding and removing clients from chat rooms list based on flag from RoomPacket received from client. The room argument is name of chat room, that client want to join or leave.
        Parameters:
        room- - chat room name
        nick- - client's nick
        flag- - join/unjoin flag
